name: 6 Mini Scented Candles Sampler
description:
A best seller! A set of 6 mini gel candles poured fresh to order.  In your choice of scent. Pick one below and list up to 5 additional scents in notes during checkout.

EXPECT QUALITY- 
-Candles are crafted one special batch at a time with patented gel wax, candle safe containers, premium non polar fragrance oils, FDA approved wicks and a touch of shimmer.
- Vegan candles that contain no animal products whatsoever.
- I'm an experienced candlemaker who's been pouring, selling and using her scented wares in her home around her family home since 2000.
- Arrives attractively packaged in kraft brown bag with coordinating washi tape.

SIZE-
- Small candle is 1.5 oz/.4.43 cl
- 6 sided candle with lid is 2 inches/5 cm high and 2 inches/ 5 cm wide
- Each candle burns for about 15 hours or 90 hours for this set

SHIPPING-
- Candles ship wrapped in recycled grocery bag material in shipping carton.
- Due to their higher melt point these candles ship well in any kind of weather, just unpack and set upright for 24-48 hours before lighting.

name: 4 Mini Scented Sachets Set
description:
4 Scented sachets handmade fresh to order in your choice of scent. These cute mini drawer sachets lend themselves perfectly to DIY favor use. I'll craft them in grocery brown color envelopes unless you request other colors in notes during checkout.

EXPECT QUALITY- 
- In Grocery Brown color envelopes. 
- Each sachet is ALWAYS handmade fresh to order with my own proprietary sachet base which hang on to scent and the fragrance dissipates slowly.
- I use generous amount of premium uncut fragrance oil in each sachet.
- Packaged in sachet envelope and crystal clear cellophane bag and triple seal to preserve freshness during shipping.
- Vegan sachets that contains no animal products what so ever.

SIZE and USAGE
- Each small envelope sachet weighs roughly .5 oz/14 grams and the envelope measures 4x3 inch/ 10x7cm.
- Remove from cello bag and scatter sachets inside drawer or enclosed space like purse, storage tub, etc.
- Some scents or stronger than others, that's just the nature of fragrance, but will last about a month in a closed drawer.

SHIPPING-
- Sachets are either shipped in a padded mailer or shipping carton.
- Priority mail is the usual shipping method, those are the rates shown.

name: 4 Scented Jelly Jar Candles - 8oz
description:
Set in a sunny windowsill to up the WOW factor! Brighten up your day. I've designed this gel candle set to look like canning jars filled with sparkling colorful jelly. In you choice of scent. Pick one below and list up to 3 additional scents in notes during checkout.

EXPECT QUALITY- 
-Candles are crafted one special batch at a time with patented gel wax, candle safe containers, premium non polar fragrance oils, FDA approved wicks and a touch of shimmer.
- Vegan candles that contain no animal products whatsoever.
- I'm an experienced candlemaker who's been pouring, selling and using her scented wares in her home around her family home since 2000.

SIZE-
- large mason jar candle is 8 oz/.22 liter
- Canning jar candle with lid is about 4 inches/10 cm high and 3 inches/ 7.6 cm wide
- Burns for about 60 hours.

SHIPPING-
- Candle ships wrapped in recycled grocery bag material and surrounded by packing material in card board mailer.
- These candles ship well in any kind of weather, just unpack and set upright for 24-48 hours before lighting.

name: 3 Scented Gel Wax Tarts Melts
description:
3 gel wax tarts that I'll pour fresh in your choice of scent. Highly scented so you can use less, this 3 pack contains enough to load your tart warmer 12 times if quartered, can easily be sliced with butter knife. Uniquely fashioned strong tarts that peel easily out of tart warmers. Also a powerful gel air freshener, simply remove lid and set on level surface, like desk or car cup holder.

EXPECT QUALITY- 
-Tarts not mass made, handpoured one small batch at a time with patented gel wax, premium non polar fragrance oil, candle dye, plastic cups with lids, caution and scent label.
-Strong scent throw!
-Super easy tart removal! Cold tart simply peels out of cold tart warmer. Way easier than regular soy or paraffin wax tarts.
- Vegan tarts that contain no animal products whatsoever.
-Plastic tart cups can be recycled. #5 PP
-I'm an experienced candlemaker who's been pouring, selling and using her scented wares at home around her family since 2000.

USE and SIZE-
- For use with electric warmers higher that 15 watts (full and mid size scentsy burners). Can also be used in tea light style warmers.
- Each single tart is 2 oz/6 cl.This 3 pack weight 6oz/18 cl
- As is fits large melt cups. For small melt cups slice tart in quarters or halves, gel wax makes it easy.
- Customizable size. With the consistency of firm jello you can easily slice into quarters or halves with butter knife.
- Place desired amount in tart warmer and replace lid to keep rest fresh.
- To remove spent cold tart, simply peel out of cold tart warmer.
-To use as air freshener simply remove lid and set on level surface. Replace lid at end of day to extend life of fragrance.
- This 3 pack contains enough to load your tart warmer 12 times if quartered.

SHIPPING-
- Tarts ship between recycled brown grocery bag material in shipping box. 
- Due to their higher melt point these tarts ship well in any kind of weather, just unpack and set upright for 24-48 hours before using.

name: 2 Scented Drawer Sachets
description:
2 Large scented drawer sachets handmade fresh to order in your choice of scent. Candle fragrance packets you can tuck anywhere and everywhere....from plastic storage tubs....linen closets....to t-shirt drawers.

EXPECT QUALITY- 
- Each sachet is ALWAYS handmade fresh to order with my own proprietary sachet base which hangs on to scent so the fragrance dissipates slowly.
- I use generous amount of premium uncut fragrance oil in each sachet.
- Packaged in grocery brown sachet envelope, crystal clear cellophane bag and triple seal to preserve freshness during shipping.
- Vegan sachets that contains no animal products what so ever.

SIZE and USAGE-
- Each large envelope sachet weighs roughly 1.2 oz/30 grams and the envelope measures 7x4.5 inch/ 18x11cm.
- Remove from cello bag and tuck sachet inside drawer or enclosed space like purse, storage tub, etc.
- Some scents or stronger than others, that's just the nature of fragrance, but these will last a good month or more in closed drawer.

SHIPPING- 
- Sachets are either shipped in a padded mailer or shipping carton. 
- Priority mail is the usual shipping method, those are the rates shown.

name: 3 Essential Oil Gel Tarts Melts
description:
3 Gel wax tarts melts made with essential oil and poured fresh for you. A one of a kind scent experience! I craft these with pure essential oils and make them dye free. Compared to soy tarts, these peel easily out of tart warmers. High quality so you can use less, this 3 pack contains enough to load your tart warmer 12 times if quartered, can easily be sliced with butter knife. Totally vegan. Looking for a naturally scented air freshener? You've found it! Simply set on level surface and remove lid.

EXPECT QUALITY- 
-Tarts not mass produced, handpoured one special batch at a time with patented gel wax, pure essential oil, #5 recycle plastic cups with lids, caution and scent label.
-Very fragrant!
- Contains no animal products whatsoever.
-I'm an experienced candlemaker who's been pouring, selling and using her scented wares at home around her family since 2000.
- Gift? Let me know via the drop down list above what type of gift this is and I'll package your gift accordingly. If you'd like, leave gift recipient address and your gift message in notes to seller.

USE and SIZE-
- For use with electric warmers higher that 15 watts (full and mid size scentsy burners). Can also be used in tea light style warmers.
- Each single tart is 2 oz/6 cl.This 3 pack weight 6oz/18 cl
- As is fits large melt cups. For small melt cups slice tart in quarters or halves, gel wax makes it easy.
- Customizable size. With the consistency of firm jello you can easily slice into quarters or halves with butter knife.
- Place desired amount in tart warmer and replace lid to keep rest fresh.
- To remove spent cold tart, simply peel out of cold tart warmer.
-To use as air freshener simply remove lid and set on level surface. Replace lid at end of day to extend life of fragrance.
- This 3 pack contains enough to load your tart warmer 12 times if quartered.

SHIPPING-
- Due to their higher melt point these tarts ship well in any kind of weather, just unpack and set upright for 24-48 hours before using.
